title: Generic schema metadata
description: Common metadata fields used in all schema definitions.

node.description: Dot notation path in the DISCOSClient namespace (e.g., 'antenna.observedAzimuth', 'mount.elevation.currentPosition')

title.description: Short human-readable title for the property.

unit.description: Physical unit of measure (e.g., %, degrees, m/s).

type.description: JSON Schema type of the value (e.g., number, integer, string).

format.description: Optional JSON Schema format annotation (e.g., int64, date-time).

enum.description: Indicates that the property can only assume specific values among the listed ones.
